Facebook customizable
This style use the font "Roboto" if you don't have installed yet, download from here: Download Roboto

data.name: Flight Rising Minimal Dragon Profile - Centered
data.description:
Edited version of the revamped profile (06/08/2020). Lessens the footprint of the profile header, removes the apparel sidebar, and centers the dragon and familiar images.

Made for personal use. Might not be updated. You have permission to use this CSS to make your own code.
